sqlMap.select:
select
IFNULL(sum(transAmt), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_epp a where a.mainyw='EPP' AND
IFNULL(sum(acceptAmt), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_zdfq a where a.mainyw='账单分期' AND
IFNULL(sum(applyAmt), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_deczj a where a.mainyw='大额EPPC' AND
IFNULL(sum(a.amount), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_eppc a LEFT JOIN mdx_eppc b ON a.mdx_eppcid=b.mdx_eppcid WHERE b.Data_type!='新发卡备用金' AND a.mainyw='EPPC' AND
IFNULL(sum(a.amount), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_eppc a LEFT JOIN mdx_eppc b ON a.mdx_eppcid=b.mdx_eppcid WHERE b.Data_type='新发卡备用金' AND a.mainyw='EPPC' AND
a.gdx_exzx=#userName# AND a.gdx_extime >=#beginTime# AND a.gdx_extime <= #endTime#

select.isEqual: select COUNT(DISTINCT md_id) AS A from bps_gdx_epp a where gdx_exzx=#userName# AND mainyw='EPP' AND gdx_extime >=#beginTime# AND gdx_extime <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer !=1
select COUNT(DISTINCT md_id) AS A from bps_gdx_zdfq a where gdx_exzx=#userName# AND mainyw='账单分期' AND gdx_extime >=#beginTime# AND gdx_extime <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer !=1
select COUNT(DISTINCT md_id) AS A from bps_gdx_deczj a where gdx_exzx=#userName# AND mainyw='大额EPPC' AND gdx_extime >=#beginTime# AND gdx_extime <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer !=1

select COUNT(DISTINCT a.md_id) AS A from bps_gdx_eppc a LEFT JOIN mdx_eppc b ON a.mdx_eppcid=b.mdx_eppcid WHERE b.Data_type!='新发卡备用金' AND a.gdx_exzx=#userName# AND a.gdx_extime >=#beginTime# AND a.gdx_extime <= #endTime# AND a.mainyw='EPPC' AND a.forceTransfer !=1

select COUNT(DISTINCT a.md_id) AS A from bps_gdx_eppc a LEFT JOIN mdx_eppc b ON a.mdx_eppcid=b.mdx_eppcid WHERE b.Data_type='新发卡备用金' AND a.gdx_exzx=#userName# AND a.gdx_extime >=#beginTime# AND a.gdx_extime <= #endTime# AND a.mainyw='EPPC' AND a.forceTransfer !=1

select COUNT(DISTINCT md_id) AS B from bps_gdx_epp a where gdx_exzx=#userName# AND mainyw='EPP' AND Update_t >=#beginTime# AND Update_t <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer =1 AND approve_rst = '成功' and status_Approved = '已批核'

select COUNT(DISTINCT md_id) AS B from bps_gdx_zdfq a where gdx_exzx=#userName# AND mainyw='账单分期' AND Update_t >=#beginTime# AND Update_t <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer =1 AND approve_rst = '成功' and status_Approved = '已批核'

select COUNT(DISTINCT md_id) AS B from bps_gdx_deczj a where gdx_exzx=#userName# AND mainyw='大额EPPC' AND Update_t >=#beginTime# AND Update_t <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer =1 AND approve_rst = '成功' and status_Approved = '已批核'

select COUNT(DISTINCT a.md_id) AS B from bps_gdx_eppc a LEFT JOIN mdx_eppc b ON a.mdx_eppcid=b.mdx_eppcid WHERE b.Data_type!='新发卡备用金' AND a.gdx_exzx=#userName# AND a.Update_t >=#beginTime# AND a.Update_t <= #endTime# AND a.mainyw='EPPC' AND a.forceTransfer =1 AND a.approve_rst = '成功' and a.status_Approved = '已批核'

select COUNT(DISTINCT a.md_id) AS B from bps_gdx_eppc a LEFT JOIN mdx_eppc b ON a.mdx_eppcid=b.mdx_eppcid WHERE b.Data_type='新发卡备用金' AND a.gdx_exzx=#userName# AND a.Update_t >=#beginTime# AND a.Update_t <= #endTime# AND a.mainyw='EPPC' AND a.forceTransfer =1 AND a.approve_rst = '成功' and a.status_Approved = '已批核'
select IFNULL(sum(transAmt), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_epp a where gdx_exzx=#userName# AND mainyw='EPP' AND gdx_extime >=#beginTime# AND gdx_extime <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer !=1
select IFNULL(sum(acceptAmt), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_zdfq a where gdx_exzx=#userName# AND mainyw='账单分期' AND gdx_extime >=#beginTime# AND gdx_extime <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer !=1
select IFNULL(sum(applyAmt), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_deczj a where gdx_exzx=#userName# AND mainyw='大额EPPC' AND gdx_extime >=#beginTime# AND gdx_extime <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer !=1

select IFNULL(sum(a.amount), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_eppc a LEFT JOIN mdx_eppc b ON a.mdx_eppcid=b.mdx_eppcid WHERE b.Data_type!='新发卡备用金' AND a.gdx_exzx=#userName# AND a.gdx_extime >=#beginTime# AND a.gdx_extime <= #endTime# AND a.mainyw='EPPC' AND a.forceTransfer !=1

select IFNULL(sum(a.amount), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_eppc a LEFT JOIN mdx_eppc b ON a.mdx_eppcid=b.mdx_eppcid WHERE b.Data_type='新发卡备用金' AND a.gdx_exzx=#userName# AND a.gdx_extime >=#beginTime# AND a.gdx_extime <= #endTime# AND a.mainyw='EPPC' AND a.forceTransfer !=1

select IFNULL(SUM(transAmt), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_epp a where gdx_exzx=#userName# AND mainyw='EPP' AND Update_t >=#beginTime# AND Update_t <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer =1 AND approve_rst = '成功' and status_Approved = '已批核'

select IFNULL(sum(acceptAmt), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_zdfq a where gdx_exzx=#userName# AND mainyw='账单分期' AND Update_t >=#beginTime# AND Update_t <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer =1 AND approve_rst = '成功' and status_Approved = '已批核'

select IFNULL(sum(applyAmt), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_deczj a where gdx_exzx=#userName# AND mainyw='大额EPPC' AND Update_t >=#beginTime# AND Update_t <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer =1 AND approve_rst = '成功' and status_Approved = '已批核'

select IFNULL(sum(a.amount), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_eppc a LEFT JOIN mdx_eppc b ON a.mdx_eppcid=b.mdx_eppcid WHERE b.Data_type!='新发卡备用金' AND a.gdx_exzx=#userName# AND a.Update_t >=#beginTime# AND a.Update_t <= #endTime# AND a.mainyw='EPPC' AND a.forceTransfer =1 AND a.approve_rst = '成功' and a.status_Approved = '已批核'

select IFNULL(sum(a.amount), 0.00) AS money from bps_gdx_eppc a LEFT JOIN mdx_eppc b ON a.mdx_eppcid=b.mdx_eppcid WHERE b.Data_type='新发卡备用金' AND a.gdx_exzx=#userName# AND a.Update_t >=#beginTime# AND a.Update_t <= #endTime# AND a.mainyw='EPPC' AND a.forceTransfer =1 AND a.approve_rst = '成功' and a.status_Approved = '已批核'
